# planeDetection

**Instance Property**

A value that specifies whether and how the session automatically attempts to detect flat surfaces in the camera-captured image.

## Declaration

```swift
var planeDetection: ARWorldTrackingConfiguration.PlaneDetection { get set }
```

## Discussion

By default, this configuration disables plane detection. If you enable [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARWorldTrackingConfiguration/PlaneDetection-swift.struct/horizontal] or [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARWorldTrackingConfiguration/PlaneDetection-swift.struct/vertical] plane detection, the session adds [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARPlaneAnchor] objects and notifies your [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARSessionDelegate], [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARSCNViewDelegate], or [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARSKViewDelegate] object when its analysis of captured video images detects an area that appears to be a flat surface.

## Tracking surfaces

- **ARWorldTrackingConfiguration.PlaneDetection**: Options for whether and how the framework detects flat surfaces in captured images.
